entry.title: "This is a blatant violation of the 14th & 5th...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

"This is a blatant violation of the 14th & 5th Amendment "equal protection under law" clause. They're still people and it is literally the state's responsibility to protect them.

Typical liberal classism and selective morality. You don't get to deem one life more valuable than another."

Gov. Jared Polis’ comments Tuesday run counter to the ethical framework in a plan drafted by his administration. Colorado officials say the plan will be revised next week.

coloradosun.com

Colorado’s governor says prisoners won’t be prioritized for a coronavirus vaccine. A state plan says otherwise.

Gov. Jared Polis’ comments Tuesday run counter to the ethical framework in a plan drafted by his administration. Colorado officials say the plan will be revised next week.Gov. Jared Polis’ comments Tuesday run counter to the ethical framework in a plan drafted by his administration. Colorado officials say the plan will be revised next week.

entry.title: Detention shouldn't be a death sentence!
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

Detention shouldn't be a death sentence!

In the 2A phase of the distribution plan, people living in congregate housing situations, such as prisoners and students in dorms, would be eligible for the vaccine.

9news.com

Timetable for prisoners getting COVID-19 vaccine draws criticism

In the 2A phase of the distribution plan, people living in congregate housing situations, such as prisoners and students in dorms, would be eligible for the vaccine.In the 2A phase of the distribution plan, people living in congregate housing situations, such as prisoners and students in dorms, would be eligible for the vaccine.

entry.title: Did you know that in Denver, no more than TWO unrelated people...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

Did you know that in Denver, no more than TWO unrelated people can live in the same household? That means you can't have more than one roommate to help pay your mortgage. Times are already tough, let's make it easier to live in Denver, not harder.

Join us in supporting Denver's proposed group living ordinance that will allow:
- up to FIVE unrelated people to live in the same household if you so choose.
- allow residential care facilities in more places ...
- the creation of congregate living spaces that could be used for teacher housing and more!

Sign up for this community meeting on Thursday from 5:30-7:30pm by clicking this link: https://denvergov-org.zoom.us/…/r…/WN_fZlzw6rKQfCuabG8H_yEGw

Not able to attend but want to support anyway? Sign our letter of support here: https://forms.gle/GCpEuFFxbkYbXtoE6

¿Sabías que en Denver, solo DOS personas no relacionadas pueden vivir en el mismo hogar? Eso significa que no pueden tener más de un compañero de cuarto o inquilino para ayudar a pagar su hipoteca. Los tiempos ya son lo suficientemente difíciles, hagamos más fácil vivir en Denver, no más difícil.

Acompáñenos en apoyar la ordenanza de vida grupal propuesta por Denver que permitirá:
- hasta CINCO personas no relacionadas para vivir en el mismo hogar si así lo desean
- instalaciones de cuidado residencial en más lugares
- la creación de espacios de vida congregados que podrían ser utilizados para la vivienda de los maestros y más!

Regístrese para esta reunión de la comunidad el jueves de 5:30-7:30pm haciendo clic en este enlace: https://denvergov-org.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN fZlzw6rKQfCuabG8H yEGw

No puede asistir pero desea apoyar de todos modos? Firma nuestra carta de apoyo aquí: https://forms.gle/GCpEuFFxbkYbXtoE6

entry.title: Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families and improving the lives of Colorado immigrants of all backgrounds. Founded in 2019 by longtime immigration activist Jeanette Vizguerra, Sanctuary4All works at the intersection of mutual aid and political action. By connecting directly impacted families with caring members of our community we will lift each other up and build a movement to affect positive systemic change for the masses. You can support our mission by purchasing pupusas from Yessenia at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co committing to a monthly donation via Patreon at Patreon.com/Sanctuary4All or donating to sanctuary-4-all on Venmo. 💕✨

entry.title: "The policies — from allowing inmates to decide for...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

"The policies — from allowing inmates to decide for themselves whether they want to wear masks, or just not providing them at all — are at odds with guidance from both the Centers for Disease Control and the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment. It is also at odds with Gov. Jared Polis’s statewide mask mandate.

“All correctional facilities should provide masks to inmates at no additional cost and assure they are worn to protect the health of everyone within these facilities,” said a spokeswoman at the Colorado State Joint Information Center. “All correctional facilities should be following Colorado’s indoor mask order.”

CPR News has found that jails across Colorado have varying policies on both supplying masks and requiring inmates to wear them throughout their jail stays.

cpr.org

As Pandemic Worsens, Mask Rules In Jails Vary From County To County

CPR News has found that jails across Colorado have varying policies on both supplying masks and requiring inmates to wear them throughout their jail stays.CPR News has found that jails across Colorado have varying policies on both supplying masks and requiring inmates to wear them throughout their jail stays.

entry.title: "As many as 551 inmates have active cases at Arkansas...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

"As many as 551 inmates have active cases at Arkansas Valley Correctional Facility, accounting for well over half of the 993 inmates housed at the prison, agency spokeswoman Annie Skinner said. Forty-five other inmates have since recovered. The outbreak was first detected Oct. 29, according to the state health department.

The outbreak is one of eight in state correctional facilities to infect more than 100 prisoners. The two largest outbreaks at the Sterling Correctional Fac...ility in northern Colorado and Fremont Correctional Facility near Cañon City have infected more than 700 prisoners living in each prison. The virus has spread fast in the facilities where inmates live in close quarters and social distancing is hard.

Seven prisoners have died from the virus thus far, including four prisoners from Sterling Correctional Facility and three from Fremont Correctional Facility. Eleven inmates from across the state Department of Corrections system are hospitalized, Skinner said."

See MoreA men's prison in Crowley County east of Pueblo is battling the largest active COVID-19 outbreak among state correctional facilities.

gazette.com

More than half of the inmates infected in COVID-19 outbreak at Colorado prison

A men's prison in Crowley County east of Pueblo is battling the largest active COVID-19 outbreak among state correctional facilities.A men's prison in Crowley County east of Pueblo is battling the largest active COVID-19 outbreak among state correctional facilities.

entry.title: "The North Carolina Department of Public Safety has...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

"The North Carolina Department of Public Safety has suspended operations and moved prisoners away from the Randolph Correctional Center in Asheboro, the Southern Correctional Institution’s minimum custody facility in Montgomery County and the Piedmont Correctional Institution’s minimum custody facility in Rowan County.

North Carolina maxed out hospital bed capacity for its inmates, according to The Charlotte Observer, citing a briefing state prison leaders sent to staff."

Major prison outbreaks are ongoing in the U.S.

forbes.com

3 North Carolina Prisons Close After State Reportedly Maxes Out Hospital Space For Inmates

Major prison outbreaks are ongoing in the U.S.Major prison outbreaks are ongoing in the U.S.

entry.title: To the people debating the Colorado Proud Boys on Saturday:...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

To the people debating the Colorado Proud Boys on Saturday:

There's no "talking it out" with a neo-fascist gang who brings armed neo-Nazis to family drag shows.

Fascism is not a valid philosophy and hate is not up for debate.

...

You can't debate revisionism, conspiracy theories, misogyny, xenophobia, anti Semitism, anti blackness, Islamophobia or transphobia.

These Proud Boys are enemies of the working class and they are committed to misunderstanding and hate.

The only way to talk to Nazis is with your fist.

Promotion of yt supremacy is not a valid contribution to the public conscience and we should reject anyone who says it is. We must reject the emboldenment of yt supremacy now or we are doomed to fight it in the future. Hate speech is inseparable from action and organization. People who defend the "free speech" of fascists are defending the claim that the community response to yt supremacy is equivalent to state repression. It is not.

Every Proud Boy rally presents an opportunity for fascists to network and collaborate. We know from history what happens time and time again when fascists achieve such coordination.The Proud Boys have violent goals and Colorado Proud Boys have been violent in Denver, Fort Collins and the Springs over and over and over again.

entry.title: "Tell him about what kind of hell you've been catching...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

"Tell him about what kind of hell you've been catching and tell him to clean his house up. And if he's not ready to clean his house up, he shouldn't have a house. It should catch on fire and burn down." Malcom X, 1962

Left Voice

After back-to-back hurricanes and years of cuts to social programs that have left thousands facing hunger and homelessness, the Congress of Guatemala has passed... yet another austerity budget that takes from the most vulnerable to line the pockets of the rich.

Now the people are taking to the streets to protest a government that does not represent them. Over 10,000 people gathered in the capital's central square.

In the first video, protestors can be seen setting the Congress on fire.
#guatemala #protests
